doc.title: Ladyfesto
doc.plot: Ladyfesto was shot during Ladyfest Philly, March 2003. The main organizers are interviewed as well as artists and attendees. They talk about the war in Iraq that broke out as the festival started, feminism, arts and crafts, consensus-based organizing, inclusion, and the sisterly city of Philadelphia. Both an account of the festival and a guide to DIY political and artistic organizing.
